executionPlan.name: $executionPlanName
executionPlan.queryExpressions:
from dataIn[geo:intersects(geometry, "$geoFenceGeoJSON")==true] select id, state, concat("Traffic alert in $areaName. State: ", state, " ", information) as information, timeStamp, geo:needToNotify(id, concat(information, state)) as notify insert into innerStream;
from innerStream[notify == true] select id, state, information, timeStamp, 0.0 as latitude, 0.0 as longitude insert into dataOut
